class.name: AbilitySystemAbilityContainer
class.brief_description: Resource used to define an actor archetype (abilities, effects, and attributes).
class.description: [AbilitySystemAbilityContainer] acts as an [b]Archetype[/b] or [b]Preset[/b] for actors. It allows designers to define a specific collection of abilities, innate effects, initial attributes, and cues in a single Resource asset. By assigning different containers to an [AbilitySystemComponent], you can easily create distinct actor types (e.g., Player, Zombie, Woodcutter NPC) with unique gameplay traits without changing the underlying node structure or code.

members.member: List of [AbilitySystemCue] resources associated with this container. These cues listen for gameplay events.
List of [AbilitySystemAbility] resources that will be granted to the owner.
Dictionary mapping attribute names (StringName/String) to their initial base values (float). Example: { "health": 100.0, "mana": 50.0 }
List of [AbilitySystemEffect] resources that will be applied automatically (usually Infinite duration).
List of Gameplay Tags granted permanently by this archetype.
